org.apache.ignite.spi

Class IgniteSpiThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public abstract class IgniteSpiThread
extends Thread
    This class provides convenient adapter for threads used by SPIs. This class adds necessary plumbing on top of the Thread class:
    • Consistent naming of threads
    • Dedicated parent thread group
